meanings.definition: To rely or depend on someone or something.
meanings.sent1: I always lippen on my best friend to help me with my homework.
meanings.sent2: She lippened on her umbrella to keep her dry in the rain.
meanings.sent3: The cat lippened on the open window to escape the room.
meanings.sent4: He lippened on his instincts to guide him through the maze of life.
meanings.sent5: The hiker lippened on the map to find his way out of the forest.

meanings.definition: To trust or have confidence in someone or something.
meanings.sent1: I lippen on my sister to keep my secrets safe.
meanings.sent2: The child lippened on his parents to protect him from the dark.
meanings.sent3: The detective lippened on his keen eye to solve the mystery.
meanings.sent4: She lippened on her lucky charm to bring her good fortune.
meanings.sent5: The team lippened on their captain to lead them to victory.
